messages.msgSnippet: Check this out ---a forum for all things Japanese. I was going through the film/tv section and it was interesting They have culture and history sections I hope
messages.messageBody:
Check this out ---a forum for all things Japanese. I was going through
the film/tv section and it was interesting

They have culture and history sections I hope to check out soon. Maybe
we can recruit some new members.

http://www.jref.com/forum/

--
Barbara Sheridan

http://www.barbarasheridan.net
